org.apache.commons.math.stat.inference
Class TestUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.math.stat.inference.TestUtils

public class TestUtils
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of static methods to create inference test instances or to perform inference tests.

Since:
1.1
Version:
$Revision: 618114 $ $Date: 2008-02-03 15:48:38 -0700 (Sun, 03 Feb 2008) $
